traits.Charge: If Antigonos moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.
traits.Decrepit State: Antigonos has disadvantage on his attack rolls.
traits.Labyrinthine Recall: Antigonos can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.
traits.Reckless: At the start of his turn, Antigonos can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls he makes during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Amphora: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If there is not already a creature inside the amphora, the target is restrained inside. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, escaping from the amphora on a success. The effect also ends if the amphora is destroyed. The amphora has AC 8, 20 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.
